title: Improve dependency display with directionality and types
description:
The issue detail page currently shows 'Dependencies' without clarifying direction or type. We should:

1. Split dependencies into two sections:
   - 'Blocked by' / 'Depends on' (forward deps where this issue depends_on others)
   - 'Blocks' / 'Required by' (reverse deps where other issues depend on this one)

2. Show dependency type on each edge:
   - blocks/blocked-by
   - related (symmetric)
   - parent/child
   - discovered-from/led-to-discovering

3. Update API to return dependency edges with type information, not just the related issue objects

4. Consider adding filtering/grouping by dependency type
